CmdLine: apt-get update     && apt-get install -y         libfreetype6-dev         libjpeg62-turbo-dev         libmcrypt-dev         libpng12-dev         libicu-dev         libxslt1-dev         libpq-dev     && docker-php-ext-install iconv     && docker-php-ext-install mcrypt     && docker-php-ext-install pdo     && docker-php-ext-install pdo_mysql     && docker-php-ext-install intl     && docker-php-ext-install xsl     && docker-php-ext-install pgsql     && docker-php-ext-install mbstring     && docker-php-ext-configure gd --with-freetype-dir=/usr/include/ --with-jpeg-dir=/usr/include/     && docker-php-ext-install gd
Commands.Name: run
